promptTexts.text:
Context: Cycle: $cycle_num. Question Number: $input_count. Task: Ask the specific question for this step in the Snow White script.

Script Logic: IF Cycle 1:
Q1: "Name an adjective a vain Queen would want to be."
Q2: "Name a weird object to compare skin to."
Q3: "Name a body part."
Q4: "Name a fruit."
Q5: "Finally, name a loud noise." (Added to satisfy the 5-loop requirement)
IF Cycle 2:
Q1: "Name a type of trash."
Q2: "Name a number between 2 and 100."
Q3: "Name a job title."
Q4: "Name a celebrity."
Q5: "Name a tool."
IF Cycle 3:
Q1: "Name a famous character for a disguise."
Q2: "Name a gross food."
Q3: "Name a cleaning product."
Q4: "Name a song title."
Q5: "Name a transparent material."
IF Cycle 4:
Q1: "Name a slow animal."
Q2: "Name an item of clothing."
Q3: "Name an action."
Q4: "Name a fast food restaurant."
Q5: "Name a celebratory sound." (Added to satisfy 5-loop)
Output: Output ONLY the question text.
